verses.verse: Therefore <WG5105> let<WG659> us<WG2249> also<WG2532>, seeing we<WG2254> are<WG2192> compassed about<WG4029> with so great<WG5118> a cloud<WG3509> of witnesses<WG3144>, lay aside<WG659> every<WG3956> weight<WG3591>, and<WG2532> the sin<WG266> which doth so easily beset<WG2139> us<WG5143>, and let us run with<WG1223> patience<WG5281> the race<WG73> that is set before<WG4295> us<WG2254>,

looking <WG872> unto<WG1519> Jesus<WG2424> the author<WG747> and<WG2532> perfecter<WG5051> of<WG4102> our faith<WG4102>, who<WG3739> for<WG473> the joy<WG5479> that was set before<WG4295> him<WG846> endured<WG5278> the cross<WG4716>, despising<WG2706> shame<WG152>, and<WG5037> hath sat down<WG2523> at<WG1722> the right hand<WG1188> of the throne<WG2362> of God<WG2316>.

For <WG1063> consider<WG357> him that hath endured<WG5278> such<WG5108> gainsaying<WG485> of<WG5259> sinners<WG268> against<WG1519> himself<WG2443>, that ye wax not<WG3361> weary<WG2577>, fainting<WG1590> in<WG5590> your<WG5216> souls<WG5590>.
Ye have<WG478> not yet<WG3768> resisted<WG478> unto<WG3360> blood<WG129>, striving<WG464> against<WG4314> sin<WG266>:

and <WG2532> ye have forgotten<WG1585> the exhortation<WG3874> which<WG3748> reasoneth<WG1256> with you<WG5213> as<WG5613> with sons<WG5207>, My<WG3450> son<WG5207>, regard<WG3643> not<WG3361> lightly<WG3643> the chastening<WG3809> of the Lord<WG2962>, Nor<WG3366> faint<WG1590> when thou art reproved<WG1651> of<WG5259> him<WG846>;
For <WG1063> whom<WG3739> the Lord<WG2962> loveth<WG25> he chasteneth<WG3811>, And<WG1161> scourgeth<WG3146> every<WG3956> son<WG5207> whom<WG3739> he receiveth<WG3858>.

It is for chastening<WG3809> that<WG1487> ye endure<WG5278>; God<WG2316> dealeth<WG4374> with you<WG5213> as<WG5613> with sons<WG5207>; for<WG1063> what<WG5101> son<WG5207> is there<WG2076> whom<WG3739> his father<WG3962> chasteneth<WG3811> not<WG3756>?

But <WG1161> if<WG1487> ye are<WG1096> without<WG5565> chastening<WG3809>, whereof<WG3739> all<WG3956> have been<WG1096> made partakers<WG3353>, then<WG686> are ye<WG2075> bastards<WG3541>, and<WG2532> not<WG3756> sons<WG5207>.

Furthermore <WG1534>, <WG3303> we had<WG2192> the fathers<WG3962> of<WG4561> our<WG2257> flesh<WG4561> to chasten<WG3810> us<WG2532>, and we gave<WG1788> them reverence<WG1788>: shall we<WG5293> not<WG3756> much<WG4183> rather<WG3123> be in subjection unto<WG5293> the Father<WG3962> of spirits<WG4151>, and<WG2532> live<WG2198>?

For <WG1063> they<WG3811> indeed<WG3303> for<WG4314> a few<WG3641> days<WG2250> chastened<WG3811> us as seemed<WG2596> good<WG1380> to them<WG846>; but<WG1161> he<WG3588> for<WG1909> our profit<WG4851>, that<WG1519> we may be partakers<WG3335> of<WG41> his<WG846> holiness<WG41>.

1161, Ezekiel3 All<WG3956> chastening<WG3809> seemeth<WG1380> for<WG4314> the present<WG3918> to be<WG1511> not<WG3756> joyous<WG5479> but<WG235> grievous<WG3077>; yet<WG1161> afterward<WG5305> it yieldeth<WG591> peaceable<WG1516> fruit<WG2590> unto them<WG2590> that have been exercised<WG1128> thereby<WG846>, <WG1223> even the fruit of righteousness<WG1343>.
Wherefore <WG1352> lift up<WG461> the hands<WG5495> that hang down<WG3935>, and<WG2532> the<WG1119> palsied<WG3886> knees<WG1119>;

and <WG2532> make<WG4160> straight<WG3717> paths<WG5163> for your<WG5216> feet<WG4228>, that<WG3363> that<WG3363> which is lame<WG5560> be not turned out of the way<WG1624>, but<WG1161> rather<WG3123> be healed<WG2390>.
Follow <WG1377> after peace<WG1515> with<WG3326> all<WG3956> men<WG2532>, and the sanctification<WG38> without<WG5565> which<WG3739> no man<WG3762> shall see<WG3700> the Lord<WG2962>:

looking carefully<WG1983> lest<WG3361> there be any man<WG5100> that falleth<WG5302> short of<WG575> the grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316>; lest<WG3361> any<WG5100> root<WG4491> of bitterness<WG4088> springing<WG5453> up<WG507> trouble<WG1776> you<WG2532>, and thereby3778, 1223 the many<WG4183> be defiled<WG3392>;

lest there<WG3361> be any<WG5100> fornicator<WG4205>, or<WG2228> profane person<WG952>, as<WG5613> Esau<WG2269>, who<WG3739> for<WG473> one<WG1520> mess of meat<WG1035> sold<WG591> his<WG846> own birthright<WG4415>.

For <WG1063> ye know<WG2467> that<WG3754> even<WG2532> when he afterward<WG3347> desired<WG2309> to inherit<WG2816> the blessing<WG2129>, he was rejected<WG593>; for<WG1063> he found<WG2147> no<WG3756> place<WG5117> for a change of mind<WG3341> in his father<WG2539>, though he sought<WG1567> it<WG846> diligently<WG1567> with<WG3326> tears<WG1144>.

For <WG1063> ye are<WG4334> not<WG3756> come unto<WG4334> a mount<WG3735> that might be touched<WG5584>, and<WG2532> that burned<WG2545> with fire<WG4442>, and<WG2532> unto blackness<WG1105>, and<WG2532> darkness<WG4655>, and<WG2532> tempest<WG2366>,

and <WG2532> the sound<WG2279> of a trumpet<WG4536>, and<WG2532> the voice<WG5456> of words<WG4487>; which<WG3739> voice they that<WG3361> heard<WG191> entreated<WG3868> that<WG3361> no word<WG3056> more should<WG4369> be spoken<WG4369> unto them<WG846>;
for <WG1063> they could<WG5342> not<WG3756> endure<WG5342> that which was enjoined<WG1291>, If even<WG2579> a beast<WG2342> touch<WG2345> the mountain<WG3735>, it shall be stoned<WG3036>;
and <WG2532> so<WG3779> fearful<WG5398> was<WG2258> the appearance<WG5324>, that Moses<WG3475> said<WG2036>, I<WG1510> exceedingly fear<WG1630> and<WG2532> quake<WG1790>:

but <WG235> ye are come<WG4334> unto mount<WG3735> Zion<WG4622>, and<WG2532> unto the city<WG4172> of the living<WG2198> God<WG2316>, the heavenly<WG2032> Jerusalem<WG2419>, and<WG2532> to innumerable hosts<WG3461> of angels<WG32>,

to the general assembly<WG3831> and<WG2532> church<WG1577> of the firstborn<WG4416> who are enrolled<WG583> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>, and<WG2532> to God<WG2316> the Judge<WG2923> of all<WG3956>, and<WG2532> to the spirits<WG4151> of just men<WG1342> made perfect<WG5048>,

and <WG2532> to Jesus<WG2424> the<WG1242> mediator<WG3316> of a new<WG3501> covenant<WG1242>, and<WG2532> to the<WG1242> blood<WG129> of sprinkling<WG4473> that speaketh<WG2980> better than<WG3844> that of Abel<WG6>.

See <WG991> that<WG3361> ye<WG991> refuse<WG3868> not<WG3361> him that speaketh<WG2980>. For<WG1063> if<WG1487> they<WG1565> escaped<WG5343> not<WG3756> when they refused<WG3868> him that warned<WG5537> them on<WG1909> earth<WG1093>, much<WG4183> more<WG3123> shall not we<WG2249> escape who turn away from<WG654> him that<WG3588> warneth from<WG575> heaven<WG3772>:

whose <WG3739> voice<WG5456> then<WG5119> shook<WG4531> the earth<WG1093>: but<WG1161> now<WG3568> he hath promised<WG1861>, saying<WG3004>, Yet<WG2089> once<WG530> more<WG2089> will I<WG1473> make to tremble<WG4579> not<WG3756> the earth<WG1093> only<WG3440>, but<WG235> also<WG2532> the heaven<WG3772>.

And <WG1161> this<WG3588> word<WG2089>, Yet once<WG530> more<WG2089>, signifieth<WG1213> the removing<WG3331> of those things that are shaken<WG4531>, as<WG5613> of things that have been made<WG4160>, that<WG2443> those things which<WG4531> are not<WG3361> shaken<WG4531> may remain<WG3306>.

Wherefore <WG1352>, receiving<WG3880> a kingdom<WG932> that cannot be shaken<WG761>, let us have<WG2192> grace<WG5485>, whereby3739, 1223 we may offer service<WG3000> well-pleasing<WG2102> to God<WG2316> with<WG3326> reverence<WG127> and<WG2532> awe<WG2124>:
for <WG2532> our<WG2257> God<WG2316> is a<WG1063> consuming<WG2654> fire<WG4442>.
